title: Fix Notion Integration for SecondBrain
description: Fix the Notion integration in the SecondBrain architecture to correctly connect to Notion databases. The current integration fails due to incorrect environment variable handling and relay mechanism issues.
criteria: Create a working Notion MCP server that connects to Notion API
Fix the environment variable handling to support both legacy and new variable names
Create a reliable relay mechanism with proper fallbacks
Implement proper error handling and logging
Add a test script that verifies the integration works correctly
Document the setup process and required configuration
